info.name: GridTokenX API Gateway
info.description:
Complete API collection for GridTokenX Platform - Peer-to-peer renewable energy trading platform built on Solana blockchain.

**Version**: 1.2.0
**Updated**: 2025-11-20
**Base URL**: Configure via environment variables

## Authentication
Most endpoints require JWT authentication. Use the login endpoint to obtain a token, which will be automatically saved to your environment.

## API Structure
All API routes are prefixed with `/api/`. Public routes include health checks and authentication endpoints. Protected routes require JWT authentication.

## Endpoints Summary
- Health & Status: 2 endpoints
- Authentication: 6 endpoints
- User Management: 7 endpoints
- Blockchain: 7 endpoints
- Oracle: 3 endpoints
- Governance: 3 endpoints
- Trading: 6 endpoints
- Tokens: 3 endpoints
- Energy Meters: 10 endpoints
- ERC Certificates: 6 endpoints
- Market Data: 4 endpoints
- Analytics: 2 endpoints
- Admin Operations: 16 endpoints
- Testing: 3 endpoints
- Audit & Security: 3 endpoints
- Epoch Management: 4 endpoints
- WebSocket: 2 endpoints
- Meter Verification: 4 endpoints

**Total**: 76+ endpoints

## Recent Updates (v1.2.0)
- Enhanced user management with email verification
- Added wallet address validation
- Added user activity tracking
- Added admin user management controls
